basic.Target Organism: Gram-positive bacteria:Staphylococcus aureus (MIC=5 µg/ml), Micrococcus luteus (MIC=5 µg/ml), Bacillus thuringiensis (MIC=10 µg/ml), B. subtilis (MIC=10 µg/ml).Fungi:Candida albicans (MIC=20 µg/ml).Antibiotic-resistant pathogens:methicillin-resistant Staphylococcus aureus (MIC=5-10 µg/ml), penicillin-resistant S. epidermidis (MIC=10 µg/ml).
